entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
